branchCategory.name: Compact
branchCategory.description: The LES electric actuator combines a motor and ball screw drive, worktable, and linear guide in compact body. The formed sheet metal table allows a lower mounting surface height, lighter weight, and greater vertical work load than the LESH slide table. Body orientations include basic, symmetrical, and inline mounted motor.

branchItem.name: LES, Electric Slide Table, Compact Type
branchItem.description: The LES electric actuator combines a motor and ball screw drive, worktable, and linear guide in compact body. The formed sheet metal table allows a lower mounting surface height, lighter weight, and greater vertical work load than the LESH slide table. Body orientations include basic, symmetrical, and inline mounted motor.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>Body sizes: 8, 16, 25 <LI>Strokes: 30, 50, 75, 100, 125, 150 (availability dependent on size) <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.05 <LI>Motor can be mounted internally with a right or left table, or in-line <LI>Motor types: high load step motor or high speed servo motor
</LI></UL>
